name: Soldier
perkDescription: Soldiers get an additional 5% chance to hit whenever another soldier hits an enemy, resets each round.

name: Archer
perkDescription: If an archer slays an enemy during first strike, they get to shoot again with 1/2 chance to hit.

name: Knight
perkDescription: If a Knight has more than 80% hp after taking damage from an enemy, they have a 1/2 chance to skip their next attack.

name: Barbarian
perkDescription: When attacked, Barbarians have a 20% chance to intentionally get hit for a lesser amount, and follow up with a guaranteed strike for 1/2 damage.

name: Ranger
perkDescription: Rangers get to pick an enemy type and always do +1 damage to them, and take -1 damage from them.

name: Thief
perkDescription: Thieves attack twice per round, for 70% of their atk pwr.

name: Paladin
perkDescription: Paladins heal 1hp at the start of each combat round.

name: Berzerker
perkDescription: Killing an enemy heals the Berzerker for 3hp.

name: Hunter
perkDescription: If your dire wolf dies, all hunters get a free attack against its killer.

name: Assassin
perkDescription: Assassins get +5% chance to hit, and +5% avoidance for each successful misdirect, resets each combat.
